faction_profile.name: 위지세가 (Weiji Family / 尉遲世家)
alias: 폭풍위지세가 (Storm Weiji Family / 暴風尉遲勢家)

location.geo_political_status: Located in the same province as the 'Hebei Peng Family', often leading to rivalry or comparison.
location.note: Exact city varies by author, but firmly established as a Northern power.

status.ambition: Constantly striving to break into the 'Five Great Families' (Odaesega).
status.position: A powerful local lord, sometimes overshadowed by the Peng Family.

combat_style.summary: Fast and destructive attacks resembling a storm.

internal_energy.description: Manifests blueish Qi. At the 10th level, it commands storm and lightning.
internal_energy.risk: High physical burden. Mastering it requires body metamorphosis (Hwangol-taltae).

list.name: 일운검법 (One Cloud Sword Art)
list.trait: Fast and sudden strikes from a cloud-like stance. Good for surprise attacks.

list.name: 팔황검법 (Eight Wastelands Sword Art)
list.trait: Heavy and destructive. Pouring all power into a single strike.

narrative_role: The 'Number 2' who is jealous of the 'Number 1' (Hebei Peng Family).
An elite clan that serves as a mid-boss before the protagonist faces the true Five Great Families.
A tragic family that ruins itself through excessive ambition.
